JOB DESCRIPTION: Your Role    As a   Software Development Engineer II (Fullstack)   , you will be responsible for building mobile experiences of consumer-facing products. You will collaborate with designers and engineers to drive the end-to-end mobile apps  development, re-defining the way the sustainable healthcare market is evolving.    A Day in Life     Working on features / projects in exciting new technology   Freedom to choose your own tech stack provided it meets the company's/projects goal and standards   Leading/Guiding the team and mentoring your peers in achieving common goals     What You Need     Good understanding and working knowledge of React, JavaScript and state management libraries like Redux   Good understanding and working knowledge of Python web development frameworks like Django / Flask .   Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, SCSS etc   Working Knowledge of relational database MySQL , PostgreSQL (SQL , transactions etc)   Quick learner - you will be required to learn new skills as per the requirement .   Good to have - knowledge of MongoDB, Celery, Object Oriented design principles, Software design principles   Good to have experience with boiler plating/setting up new react/django/flask projects.   Knowledge of Dev-Ops will be appreciated.
